news.text1: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.

After escaping an attempted murder, Franck Lazarev must find his wife Leo, who has been kidnapped by a mysterious group of armed men. He is caught up with his past and plunged into a state affair that is beyond his control.
A young woman returns home against her grandfather's wishes, sparking hauntings by the Kromoleo, ghostly pallbearers who are tied to her father's death.
A family of four is stuck on an idyllic island that hides a shocking reality.
Bryan Johnson, a wealthy entrepreneur, puts his body and fortune on the line to defy ageing and extend his life beyond all known limits.

A woman planning her sister's ideal wedding and the father of a bride-to-be discover their destination weddings at a remote resort are double-booked. When both parties decide to share the small venue, chaos ensues and disaster awaits..

news.dd: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction Part 1
news.text1: Follows two high school friends, Koyama Kadode and Nakagawa Oran, as they navigate adulthood amidst an alien invasion.
